name: LetItRain
short_description:
*This download mirror is only for snapshots and pre-releases as well as alternative download links for the plugin. For the official page, please go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/let-it-rain/

Let It Rain
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be caught in a rainstorm of pigs falling from the sky? Your search is over!

With Let It Rain, you will be able to spawn massive pig storms over yourself or other players. You can control the creature type, the amount, the radius and the target. Raining TNT, xpbottles, arrows, and all blocks/items also available. LetItRain generates a config.yml which lets you edit the blacklist, the default values and the message that will be displayed when a command is called. Zeus and Strike commands also available. Please read http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/let-it-rain/
for more information and official download links.
summary: Minecraft Bukkit Pugin - Let It Rain
